title: Bayer CropScience 's revenue 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenues in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Revenues in million euros, of value 14266.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Revenues in million euros about 5700.0 was reached at Year 2006
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenues in million euros, containing a total of 14 data points.
In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.

Revenues in million euros is roughly constant from 2005 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, roughly increasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, and lastly gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018.
